entry.RedBlue: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high voltage power.
entry.Yellow: When electricity builds up inside its body, it becomes feisty. It also glows in the dark.
entry.Gold: When its electricity builds, its muscles are stimulated, and it becomes more aggressive than usual.
entry.Silver: If the electric pouches in its cheeks become fully charged, both ears will stand straight up.
entry.Crystal: If its electric pouches run empty, it raises its tail to gather electricity from the atmosphere.
entry.Ruby: If the electrical sacks become excessively charged, RAICHU plants its tail in the ground and discharges. Scorched patches of ground will be found near this POKéMON’s nest.
entry.Sapphire: This POKéMON exudes a weak electrical charge from all over its body that makes it take on a slight glow in darkness. RAICHU searches for electricity by planting its tail in the ground.
entry.FireRed: Its electric charges can reach even 100,000 volts. Careless contact can cause even an Indian elephant to faint.
entry.LeafGreen: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high-voltage power.
entry.Emerald: If it stores too much electricity, its behavior turns aggressive. To avoid this, it occasionally discharges excess energy and calms itself down.
entry.Diamond: It turns aggressive if it has too much electricity in its body. It discharges power through its tail.
entry.Pearl: It can loose 100,000-volt bursts of electricity, instantly downing foes several times its size.
entry.Platinum: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.
entry.HeartGold: When its electricity builds, its muscles are stimulated, and it becomes more aggressive than usual.
entry.SoulSilver: If the electric pouches in its cheeks become fully charged, both ears will stand straight up.
entry.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.
entry.X: When its electricity builds, its muscles are stimulated, and it becomes more aggressive than usual.
entry.Y: It can loose 100,000-volt bursts of electricity, instantly downing foes several times its size.
entry.Omega Ruby: If the electrical sacs become excessively charged, Raichu plants its tail in the ground and discharges. Scorched patches of ground will be found near this Pokémon’s nest.
entry.Alpha Sapphire: This Pokémon exudes a weak electrical charge from all over its body that makes it take on a slight glow in darkness. Raichu plants its tail in the ground to discharge electricity.
entry.Sun: It unleashes electric shocks that can reach 100,000 volts. When agitated, it can knock out even an Indian elephant.
entry.Moon: It becomes aggressive when it has electricity stored up. At such times, even its Trainer has to take care to avoid being attacked.
